name: Color Palette
author: LUBUS

sections.description:
Disclaimer: Plugin development is in progress & we are constantly improving the code. If you think code can be improved or have any suggestion feel free to send a PR or open an issue.

Quickly create & share color palettes on your website

Usage

  • Simply activate and new block for “Color Palette” will be added to block inserter
  • Insert block and add your colors
  • Live preview palette in your editor

Roadmap

  • More customization options

If you have any suggestions/Feature request that you would like to see in the upcoming releases , feel free to let us know in the issues section
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
2. Search for Color Palette or upload zip file
3. Activate Color Palette from your Plugins page

Manual Installation
1. Download “Color Palette”.
2. Upload the color-palette-block directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
3. Activate Color Palette from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
v1.1.0

Released on 29th June 2018

  • Compatibility with gutenberg 3.1.x
  • ES import for WP depenedencies
  • Minor UI tweaks

v1.0.0

Released on 29th March 2018

  • Initial plugin release

From your WordPress dashboard

2. Upload the color-palette-block directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
